channel.title: Multiple pick up fix?
channel.description: Hey I am editing a 317 and when I go to picking up something off of the ground, I get as many of the item as however many times I clicked. Example: If I quickly clicked a single Dragon longsword that was on the floor 5 times, 5 would appear in my inventory. How can I stop this and make it so I only get one no matter how many times I click it? Thanks :)

item.title: Multiple pick up fix?
item.dc:creator: @burizo burizo
item.description:
@burizo wrote:

Hey I am editing a 317 and when I go to picking up something off of the ground, I get as many of the item as however many times I clicked. Example: If I quickly clicked a single Dragon longsword that was on the floor 5 times, 5 would appear in my inventory. How can I stop this and make it so I only get one no matter how many times I click it? Thanks
